00001 /*********************************************************************
00002 
00003   Name:         mvmestd.h
00004   Created by:   Stefan Ritt
00005 
00006   Cotents:      Midas VME standard routines (MVMESTD) supplying an
00007                 abstract layer to all supported VME interfaces. So far,
00008                 bt617.c and sis3100.c are supported
00009 
00010   *** muCap patches ***
00011   - choose DWORD type appropriately for x86-64.
00012                 
00013   $Log: mvmestd.h,v $
00014   Revision 1.2  2005/06/21 00:14:14  mucap
00015   (Fred)
00016   Choose DWORD type appropriately for x86-64.
00017

00045 /*---- replacements if not running under MIDAS ---------------------*/
00046 
00047 #ifndef MIDAS_TYPE_DEFINED
00048 #define MIDAS_TYPE_DEFINED
00049 
00050 typedef unsigned short int WORD;
00051 
00052 #if defined(__alpha) || defined(__x86_64__)
00053 typedef unsigned int DWORD;
00054 #else
00055 typedef unsigned long int DWORD;
00056 #endif
00057 
00058 #define SUCCESS  1
00059 
00060 #endif                          /* MIDAS_TYPE_DEFINED */
00061 
00062 /* make functions under WinNT dll exportable */
00063 #if defined(_MSC_VER) && defined(MIDAS_DLL)
00064 #define EXPRT __declspec(dllexport)
00065 #else
00066 #define EXPRT
00067 #endif
00068 
00069 /*---- status codes ------------------------------------------------*/
00070 
00071 #define MVME_SUCCESS                  1
00072 #define MVME_NO_INTERFACE             2
00073 #define MVME_NO_CRATE                 3
00074 #define MVME_UNSUPPORTED              4
00075 
00076 /*---- types -------------------------------------------------------*/
00077 
00078 typedef unsigned long mvme_addr_t;
00079 typedef unsigned long mvme_size_t;
00080 
00081 /*---- constants ---------------------------------------------------*/
00082 
00083 /* data modes */
00084 #define MVME_A16D16                   1
00085 #define MVME_A16D32                   2
00086 #define MVME_A24D16                   3
00087 #define MVME_A24D32                   4
00088 #define MVME_A32D16                   5
00089 #define MVME_A32D32                   6
00090 #define MVME_RAMD16                   7   /* RAM memory of VME adapter */
00091 #define MVME_RAND32                   8
00092 #define MVME_LM                       9   /* local memory mapped to VME */
00093 
00094 /* vme_ioctl commands */
00095 #define MVME_IOCTL_CRATE_SET          0
00096 #define MVME_IOCTL_CRATE_GET          1
00097 #define MVME_IOCTL_AMOD_SET           2
00098 #define MVME_IOCTL_AMOD_GET           3
00099 #define MVME_IOCTL_DMA_SET            4
00100 #define MVME_IOCTL_DMA_GET            5
00101 #define MVME_IOCTL_FIFO_SET           6
00102 #define MVME_IOCTL_FIFO_GET           7
00103 
00104 /* vme bus address modifiers */
00105 #define MVME_AMOD_A32_SB     (0x0F)      /* A32 Extended Supervisory Block */
00106 #define MVME_AMOD_A32_SP     (0x0E)      /* A32 Extended Supervisory Program */
00107 #define MVME_AMOD_A32_SD     (0x0D)      /* A32 Extended Supervisory Data */
00108 #define MVME_AMOD_A32_NB     (0x0B)      /* A32 Extended Non-Privileged Block */
00109 #define MVME_AMOD_A32_NP     (0x0A)      /* A32 Extended Non-Privileged Program */
00110 #define MVME_AMOD_A32_ND     (0x09)      /* A32 Extended Non-Privileged Data */
00111 #define MVME_AMOD_A32_SMBLT  (0x0C)      /* A32 Multiplexed Block Transfer (D64) */
00112 #define MVME_AMOD_A32_NMBLT  (0x08)      /* A32 Multiplexed Block Transfer (D64) */
00113 
00114 #define MVME_AMOD_A32     MVME_AMOD_A32_SD
00115 #define MVME_AMOD_A32_D64 MVME_AMOD_A32_SMBLT
00116 
00117 #define MVME_AMOD_A24_SB     (0x3F)      /* A24 Standard Supervisory Block Transfer      */
00118 #define MVME_AMOD_A24_SP     (0x3E)      /* A24 Standard Supervisory Program Access      */
00119 #define MVME_AMOD_A24_SD     (0x3D)      /* A24 Standard Supervisory Data Access         */
00120 #define MVME_AMOD_A24_NB     (0x3B)      /* A24 Standard Non-Privileged Block Transfer   */
00121 #define MVME_AMOD_A24_NP     (0x3A)      /* A24 Standard Non-Privileged Program Access   */
00122 #define MVME_AMOD_A24_ND     (0x39)      /* A24 Standard Non-Privileged Data Access      */
00123 #define MVME_AMOD_A24_SMBLT  (0x3C)      /* A24 Multiplexed Block Transfer (D64) */
00124 #define MVME_AMOD_A24_NMBLT  (0x38)      /* A24 Multiplexed Block Transfer (D64) */
00125 
00126 #define MVME_AMOD_A24     MVME_AMOD_A24_SD
00127 #define MVME_AMOD_A24_D64 MVME_AMOD_A24_SMBLT
00128 
00129 #define MVME_AMOD_A16_SD  (0x2D) /* A16 Short Supervisory Data Access            */
00130 #define MVME_AMOD_A16_ND  (0x29) /* A16 Short Non-Privileged Data Access         */
00131 
00132 #define MVME_AMOD_A16     MVME_AMOD_A16_SD
00133

00141    int EXPRT mvme_init();
